# Travelcards.ch

## About
Travelcards.ch is a Swiss railway subscription calculator that helps users compare different public transport subscription options in Switzerland. The calculator determines the most cost-effective subscription (GA, Halbtax, Halbtax Plus, or no subscription) based on individual travel patterns.

## Pages
- / : Main calculator for comparing Swiss railway subscriptions
- /info : Information about the calculator and how it works

## Features
- Compare GA (General Abonnement), Halbtax, and Halbtax Plus subscriptions
- Support for multiple travel routes with custom frequencies
- Multi-language support: English, German, French, Italian, Romansh
- Age group and travel class options
- Real-time cost calculations based on official SBB pricing

## Contact
Website: https://travelcards.ch
